short_summary: Pesticide Efficacy and Tolerance Trials, Screening Trials and Residue Trials
description: TO CONDUCT PESTICIDE EFFICACY AND TOLERANCE TRIALS, SCREENING TRIALS AND RESIDUE TRIALS IN ACCORDANCE WITH OECD GOOD LABORATORY PRACTICES (GLP), Zones 5/5A/5B Celeri, Celeri, Asperge, Phloueur, pour foin et fourrage, Pche, Zones 7 Tournesol, Herbe (aneth), Pois, sec, Zone 7A Herbe (menthe), Zone 12 Bleuet en corymbe, Zone 14 Herbe (phloueur), pour foin et fourrage, Pois sec, Zones n-a Pomme, Broccoli, Raisin
